oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Formal portrait of James Shannon Buchanan
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Formal portrait photograph, black and white, of James Shannon Buchanan (1864-1930) during his service to the University of Oklahoma. He was a professor of history and served as Dean of the College of Arts and Sciences for fourteen years before being appointed as President of the University in 1923. He was the uncle of James McGill Buchanan.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Buchanan family
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: May be reproduced for educational and research purposes. Credit image to Special Collections, James E. Walker Library, MTSU;
